import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{FaUniversity,FaStickyNote,FaBookOpen,FaFileAlt,FaChalkboardTeacher}from'react-icons/fa';// Reusable axios instance
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE});const DashboardCards=()=>{const[stats,setStats]=useState({totalUniversities:0,totalCourses:0,notesCount:0,syllabusCount:0,papersCount:0});useEffect(()=>{API.get('/api/stats').then(res=>setStats(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error('Failed to fetch stats:',err));},[]);const cards=[{title:'Total Universities',value:stats.totalUniversities,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUniversity,{className:"text-4xl text-blue-600"}),color:'bg-blue-100'},{title:'Total Courses',value:stats.totalCourses,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChalkboardTeacher,{className:"text-4xl text-orange-500"}),color:'bg-orange-100'},{title:'Notes Uploaded',value:stats.notesCount,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaStickyNote,{className:"text-4xl text-green-600"}),color:'bg-green-100'},{title:'Syllabus Entries',value:stats.syllabusCount,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBookOpen,{className:"text-4xl text-yellow-600"}),color:'bg-yellow-100'},{title:'Question Papers',value:stats.papersCount,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaFileAlt,{className:"text-4xl text-purple-600"}),color:'bg-purple-100'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-6",children:cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6 flex flex-col items-center text-center ".concat(card.color," dark:bg-gray-800"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-4",children:card.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-700 dark:text-white mb-1",children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-yellow-300",children:card.value})]},index))});};export default DashboardCards;
